'''Beryl Conch''' is a [[Local Specialty]] found in [[Fontaine]]. It can be found underwater while [[Diving]].

==How to Obtain==
See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=500 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

==Description==
{{Description|A conch-like structure that gives off a faint glow. Despite the name, it is not a shell but something condensed from primordial elemental energy.<br>Natural historians used to hold that the salt-white pattern on the conch was one of the many marks left by the [[Egeria|Hydro Lord]]. However, archaeologists later discovered that it has many connections to ancient civilizations.}}
